application.name: mar92isis
application.brief: Convert Mariner9 images to Isis cubes.
application.description: Converts raw mariner9 images to Isis cubes. This includes converting labels and adding the group reseaus, and which encounter the image is specific to.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.brief: Input file to be converted to an Isis cube
parameter.description: The raw Mariner9 image to be converted to an Isis cube with complete labels.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: The resultant cube containing the Mariner9 image.

parameter.name: PIXELSONLY
parameter.description: Some labels don't have an entry in the SEDR. Normally this would prevent the output from being generated. Use this setting if you still want to see the pretty picture.

example.description: This example shows the simple process of importing a Mariner9 image.

terminalInterface.description: The command line argument needed to execute an import of a Mariner9 image.
